description: Average of the first n primes rounded down.
comments: Closely related to the prime number theorem; a(n) has the asymptotic expression n * log(n) / 2.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) { n=0; s=0; forprime (p=2, prime(1000), s+=p; write("b060620.txt", n++, " ", floor(s/n)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 08 2009]
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Apr 25 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 11 2001
